# PitchClass

# PitchClass

Represents a pitch class.

Kind: global class

  • PitchClass
    • new exports.PitchClass(pitchClass)
    • instance
      • .pitchClass : String
      • .classSet : String
      • .classIndex : Number
      • .raw ⇒ String
      • .interval(interval) ⇒ PitchClass
      • .toString() ⇒ String
    • static
      • .isFlat(pitchClass) ⇒ boolean
      • .isSharp(pitchClass) ⇒ boolean
      • .flatToSharp(pitchClass) ⇒ string
      • .sharpToFlat(pitchClass) ⇒ string

# new exports.PitchClass(pitchClass)

Param
pitchClass

Example

const c = new PitchClass('d')

# pitchClass.pitchClass : String

Returns the pitch class.

Kind: instance property of PitchClass

# pitchClass.classSet : String

Get the set of the pitch class - sharp or flat.

Kind: instance property of PitchClass

# pitchClass.classIndex : Number

Get the index of the pitch class out of the 12 classes (C, Db, etc...).

Kind: instance property of PitchClass

# pitchClass.raw ⇒ String

Returns the pitch class as a string.

Kind: instance property of PitchClass

# pitchClass.interval(interval) ⇒ PitchClass

Retuns the pure pitch class at interval.

Kind: instance method of PitchClass

Param
interval

Example

const c = new PitchClass('c")
console.log(c.interval(5)) // F

# pitchClass.toString() ⇒ String

Returns string of the pitch class.

Kind: instance method of PitchClass

# PitchClass.isFlat(pitchClass) ⇒ boolean

Returns true if pitch class has a flat in it, else false.

Kind: static method of PitchClass

Param
pitchClass

# PitchClass.isSharp(pitchClass) ⇒ boolean

Returns true if pitch class has a sharp in it, else false.

Kind: static method of PitchClass

Param
pitchClass

# PitchClass.flatToSharp(pitchClass) ⇒ string

Transforms a pitch class represented with a flat to a sharp. e.g Gb -> F#

Kind: static method of PitchClass

Param Type
pitchClass string

# PitchClass.sharpToFlat(pitchClass) ⇒ string

Transforms a pitch class represented with a sharp to a flat. e.g F# -> Gb

Kind: static method of PitchClass

Param Type
pitchClass string

Note →
